**Departments**

Department-related endpoints that demonstrate Table-Valued Function (TVF) integration. This endpoint generates fictional user test data for a specific department and serves as an example of how to implement and use TVFs in Portway.

> [!NOTE]
> This endpoint showcases the power of SQL Table-Valued Functions for dynamic data generation and serves as a reference implementation for other TVF-based endpoints.

> [!TIP]
> You can specify a department by using `/<id>` in the path (e.g., `/Departments/5` to get users for department ID 5).

MethodDocumentation.GET: Generate **fictional user records** for a specific department using Table-Valued Functions. This endpoint demonstrates how to integrate SQL Server's table valued functions.
